body.name: Eddie Bauer Boys' Reversible Jacket - Deer Harbor Waterproof Lightweight Puffer Coat with Faux Shearling Lining (5-20)
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED EDDIE BAUER: Waterproof Quilted Puffer Jacket Raincoat with Reversible Sherpa Fur Lining; Eddie Bauer combines its adventure-driven innovation with even more sustainability and inclusivity, using materials and methods that minimize impact, and building an outdoor culture open to everyone

REVERSIBLE JACKET: This multipurpose and versatile reversible raincoat is a must-have for all stylish boys; with a quilted puffer on one side and a faux shearling fur jacket on the other, Stay safe from the elements when the weather changes; Perfect for casual wear, this lightweight reversible puffer comes in a variety of fashionable colors to match your kid's unique style

STORMREPEL: Formulated with the StormRepel finish that causes moisture to bead on the surface and roll off rather than soak into the fabric; Weather resistant lightweight bubble puffer winter jacket is perfect for winter sports and casual wear

LIGHTWEIGHT INSULATION: This multipurpose and versatile reversible puffer jacket is a must-have for all stylish boys; Quality lightweight puffer jacket will help your son or daughter stay dry; Perfect for casual wear, Stay warm and dry without being too bulky; Deep hip pockets cover chilly hands and keep valuables safe; With this fashionable windbreaker raincoat, your little boy will enjoy a warm yet lightweight insulation against the elements

COMFORT FIT: Comfortable and extra warm reversible puffer jacket comes in a variety of sizes to ensure a perfect fit; With several classic color options to choose from, this waterproof jacket is a perfect gift idea for sons, grandsons, brothers , cousins, and friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son loves his new coat. He said it’s so soft inside, keeps him very warm, and is all around comfortable. It is reversible, but he has only wore it one way (with the fleece inside). It fit perfect! Quality seems great so far. I wash it weekly, and so far so good. It has zipper pockets which we both love. He keeps up with his gloves better that way. So that makes us both happy! Would definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for chilly weather!
reviews.reviewText: As a parent, I am always looking for high-quality, versatile clothing options for my child, and this puffer coat definitely fits the bill. First, the coat is incredibly well-made with high-quality materials. The waterproof outer layer provides excellent protection from the elements, while the faux shearling lining provides warmth and comfort. The lightweight puffer design is great too as my son doesn't like heavy coats. Second, the coat is reversible, providing two different style options in one. The solid color on one side and the pattern on the other side make it easy to create a different outfit, which is great for parents who want to simplify their kids' wardrobe. My son says that the non furry side is also great when you're active outside as it allows you to keep warm without overheating. Third, the coat is very easy to care for. It is machine washable and maintains its shape and color after washing, which is essential for busy parents.Overall, I am extremely satisfied and would highly recommend it to any parent looking for a high-quality, versatile coat for their child. It is well-made, functional, stylish, and easy to care for, making it a great investment for any family. Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice - but definitely size way up
reviews.reviewText: My 11.5 y/o son is thin and amongst the smallest kids in his class. I would've normally ordered size 10-12, but since we live in Southern CA and don't need a warm jacket all that often, and his skinny arms are pretty long, I decided to order the next size up. Unfortunately, 12-14 wasn't available so I went for 14-16, thinking that even if he will have a major growth spurt it will fit next winter, or perhaps the one after. I assumed it will be huge. Wrong!!! Size 14-16 fits my slight boy perfectly, and the kid who normally has zero interest in clothes fell in love with this one the moment he saw it.The jacket is VERY nice indeed - so warm and soft on the inside, and waterproof on the outside. The hood is the perfect size as well.Really happy with this purchase and I'm now going to see if Eddie Bauer makes the same in adult sizes. I want one for myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size was not as listed correctly
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a size 10-12 for my 10 year old boy. The size on the tag when it arrived was Medium and it was too small. The color listed was Dark Waters but the color on the tag said Princess Blue (color name doesn’t matter though) I returned it and for the size 14 and it fits. Other than that it’s light weight and warm and I like that it’s reversible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son love the coat it’s nice and warm inside and it’s reversible awsome thanks amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with it
reviews.reviewText: Bought this coat for both my boys (ages 10 and 12). The fleece lining is so warm. Jacket fits true to size. Its been very durable and washes easily. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purchase for son!!
reviews.reviewText: We live in a humid climate with only a few months when temp drops below freezing. So finding a durable, warm jacket with a hood was impossible. My son is picky with textures and design, but LOVED the jacket. Super soft. It's lined with the soft faux shearling through arms and hood. Most soft linings don't extend to sleeves and hood. Runs true to size. And the price was reasonable. Very happy with purchase :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This coat fits well and looks great.
